v0.1.0.description:
# Dark Souls II Archipelago - First Release

## Features:
- **Randomized Boss Rewads:** Only boss rewards are randomized. NPC, covenant, and other rewards are detected but not randomized for now.
- **Randomized Item Pickups:** All item pickups are randomized, except for enemy drops.
- **Locations:** Both Vanilla and Scholar of the First Sin locations are included. Some location items differ between versions and further testing is needed for finding and removing unused/unwanted locations.
- **Game Completion Rules:** Basic rules are set to be able to reach the end of the game. The current game completion is based on killing Nashandra, with the Aldia ending not being supported yet.

## Options:
- **NG+ and DLCs:** These are optional and are turned off by default.
- **Death Link:** Choose whether Death Link will be activated.
- **Game Version:** Choose between Vanilla or Scholar of the First Sin.

This release is a work in progress and most of the testing was done in the vanilla version.
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0 - first release

v0.2.0.description:
# Dark Souls II Archipelago

## What's Changed
* Now when picking up an item from another world a pop up message will show the player who it was sent to and what item it was.
* Added a check to the client to confirm that the game version matches the version chosen in the YAML file.
* Added an option in the YAML file to remove weapon requirements.
* World additions and changes
    - Added speaking with the ancient dragon as a location
    - Added rule to require Key to King's Passage to go to the Looking Glass Knight boss fight
    - Added rule to require the Rotundas Lockstone to enter Huntman's Copse
    - Added rule to require the Silvercat Ring to enter the pit
    - Changed rules to use events instead of hand placing items in locations
* Added (most) shops as locations and associated world rules. For now shops will only contain items from the player's world. Prices will be the default price for that slot in the shop.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description:
## What's Changed
* Make sure lava locations don't have progression items
* Add belfry luna and belfry sol as regions and add their related rules
* Some minor key locations now require their key to access
* Rule for the pit now also accepts the Flying Feline Boots
* Memory of Jeigh connection from FOFG now also requires Soldier Key
* Added rule to make sure the player has a Fragrant Branch of Yore for Straid of Olaphis checks

## New Contributors
Thank you @ManNamedGarbo for the contributions

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1
v0.2.1.title: v0.2.1

v0.2.2.description:
## What's Changed (Client and World)
* Removed consumables and ammo from shops
* Added an option to keep the infinite supply of lifegems from melentia
* Made it so you can exclude regions using the exclude_locations in the config file
* Excluded the "guide the pig" check from having progression items

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2
v0.2.2.title: v0.2.2

v0.2.3.description:
## What's Changed
* Splitting enable_dlc into individual options by @ManNamedGarbo
* Fix deathlink not sending when dying to non instant kills
* Add the event that gives the forgotten key as a location
* Add rules for the locations that require the forgotten key
* Remove Titchy Gren and Darkdiver Grandahl shops from being locations (at least until i add an option for covenant stuff)
* Attempt at fixing crashes in the vanilla version (not very successful)
* Separated the giant's memories into their own regions
* Added rules for the pursuer area. (soldier key)
* Added rules to the upper floor of the cardinal tower
* Moved all the pit locations to grave of saints so that they are properly affected by the rules. (cat ring)
* Made the tree in Nadjka's arena and the drop from the Rotten's arm not have progression items
* Made it so items from the dlcs that are not enable won't appear in the item pool

Thank you to **Bimon** on discord for helping me figure out the problem with deathlink not sending sometimes.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.2.2...v0.2.3
v0.2.3.title: v0.2.3

v0.3.0.description:
## What's Changed
* Replaced Fragrant Branch of Yore with "Unpetrify Statue X" items to prevent softlocks
* Added rules related to the statues
* Separated Sinners Rise into a different location and added related rules
* Added missing rule for Lenigrast's workshop chest
* Fix player not receiving items that were sent to them if they were starting a new save
* Attempt at fixing crashes when receiving an item while other item is being added to the inventory
* Torch Changes
   - Player now starts with a torch
   - Torches are infinite
   - Torches are no longer in the item pool

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.2.3...v0.3.0
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
## What's Changed
* Fixes to Steady Hand Mcduff's shop locations
   - Fixed logic to require the Dull Ember for all of his shop locations
   - Removed unused locations related to his shop
* Fixed dlc keys not being in the item pool for sotfs
* Fixed gutter location to be vanilla only (became a mimic in sotfs)
   - `[Gutter] Wooden chest on the middle floor of an wooden building near where Melinda the Butcher invades.`
* Grouped items based on their item category so they can be used in options like "local_items"
* Fixed problem where vanilla was still getting fragrant branches in the item pool
* Another attempt at fixing crashes on pickups for vanilla
* Added logging of debug information to a file

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1
v0.3.1.title: v0.3.1

v0.4.0.description:
## What's Changed
* Changes to Pharros Lockstones
   - Renamed them to "Master Lockstone" and made it unique
   - Gave the "Master Lockstone" infinite uses
   - Made it so there is only 1 "Master Lockstone" in the item pool and no Pharros Lockstones
   - Added rules for locations that are locked behind a Pharros contraption
* Made a group named Fragrant Branch of Yore with all the statues and a group called Pharros Lockstone with the Master Lockstone to allow for things like `!hint Pharros Lockstone` and  `!hint Fragrant Branch of Yore`
* Changes to item pool to try to keep more of the default items and less fillers
   - Previously: go through each location and pick one of its rewards (prioritizing progression items) and add it to the pool. Then fill the pool with filler items
   - New: add all rewards for each location to the item pool. If its overfilled remove filler items until its the correct size, if its underfilled fill with filler items


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.0
v0.4.0.title: v0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
## What's Changed
* Fixed problem with some merchant drops giving the reward for a shop location due to overlapping ids
* Made it so locations that are enemy drops don't have progression items since they can be lost
* Removed multiple unused locations from the dlcs
* Added proper name to some vanilla only locations that were missing a description
* Made wooden chests unbreakable to prevent losing checks
* Added proper support for items from other worlds to appear in the shops
* Changed the world rules to allow items from other players to appear in shop locations

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

v0.4.2.description:
## What's Changed
* Fixed locations in lost bastille that were unreachable due to lack of rules related to the key/statue
* The "no weapon requirements" option now also removes the requirements for powerstancing
* Added a new option to remove spell requirements
* Fixed problem where an item pickup would not disappear from the ground if the original item didn't fit your inventory (for example, if you picked up a check that originally has a key that you already have in your inventory)
* Rewrote the function to get the pickup id in SOTFS
    - Fixes the crash for when picking up an item from a crow trade
    - Hopefully fixes other problems with not getting items/getting the message for the wrong item

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2
v0.4.2.title: v0.4.2

v0.4.3.description:
## What's Changed
* Added missing rules to some FOFG locations that required the soldier's key
* Made it so items from chest don't disappear if you already have the original item
* Fixed crash when a shop item from other world had an accented character

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3
v0.4.3.title: v0.4.3

v0.5.0.description:
# DarkSoulsII Archipelago - v0.5.0

## Additions
- Shop items from other worlds will now show the archipelago icon
- Added an option for getting the blacksmith key early
- Non archipelago locations are now randomized by a static randomizer that shuffles the loot tables
  - Enemy drops are now randomized (guaranteed drops are only shuffle with other guaranteed drops)
  - Shop items with more than 1 stock were removed from archipelago locations and now are dealt with by the static randomizer
    - Infinite items are only shuffled with other infinite items
    - Unique items (1 stock) are shuffle only with other unique items
    - Non unique items are shuffle only with other non unique items
  - Pickups/Rewards not currently included in archipelago are also randomized (covenant shops and shops with requirements)

## Changes
- The game loot tables are now changed instead of just intercepting when an item is given to the player
  - Fixes problems with disappearing items and wrong messages
  - Picking up an item for the second time will now give the randomized item again instead of the original one 
- Shops that require something from a specific region are now logically in that region as well so that excluding regions will also remove shop locations that require something from that region

## Fixes
- Fixed memory of vammar location not being marked as ng+
- Added missing rule for the item blocked by the gulch statue in sotfs
- Added missing rules for locations requiring the bastille key
- Added house key to the item pool and related location rules #49
- Added a delay between giving items to hopefully fix problem with not getting some items in async
- Added Tseldora Den Key to the item pool and related rules
- Lockstones no longer drop from enemies nor can they be sold

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.4.3...v0.5.0
v0.5.0.title: v0.5.0

v0.5.0-alpha.1.description:
## What's Changed
* Major client rewrite
   - The game loot tables are now changed instead of just intercepting when an item is given to the player
   - Should fix problems with chest items disappearing and incorrect messages for the item received
   - Now checking a location for a second time still gives the randomized item instead of the original one
* Static randomizer
   - Non unique shop locations (quantity greater than 1) have been removed from the apworld and are now dealt with by the static randomizer that swaps around items based on whether their stock is unique, non unique, or infinite.
   - Any pickup/reward that is not included in the apworld is now randomized (loot tables are shuffled around)
v0.5.0-alpha.1.title: v0.5.0-alpha.1

v0.5.0-alpha.2.description:
## What's Changed
* Fixed memory of vammar location not being marked as ng+
* Added missing rule for the item blocked by the gulch statue in sotfs
* Added missing rules for locations requiring the bastille key
* Guaranteed enemy drops are now only shuffled with other guaranteed enemy drops
* Added house key to the item pool and related location rules #49
* Added a delay between giving items to hopefully fix problem with not getting some items in async
* Added Tseldora Den Key to the item pool and related rules

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.5.0-alpha.1...v0.5.0-alpha.2
v0.5.0-alpha.2.title: v0.5.0-alpha.2

v0.5.1.description:
# DarkSoulsII Archipelago - v0.5.1

## Additions
- Added option to remove equip load
- Added option to randomize starter classes and starting gifts
- Added option to auto equip weapons, armor and rings

## Fixes
- Fixed dlc items being in the pool even if the dlc is not enabled 
- Fixed a duplicate location id 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1
v0.5.1.title: v0.5.1

v0.5.2.description:
# DarkSoulsII Archipelago - v0.5.2

## Additions
- Added qol patch that skips the logos and the "press start" part when you open the game
- Added temporary warning to the new game plus and dlc options in the yaml to warn players that those options are not currently working as intended

## Fixes
- Fix error that caused all ds2 players in the same archipelago room to have the same item drops
- Fix error that caused players to not receive items if they were receiving normal and custom items at the same time (hopefully fixes the async missing items problem)
- Renamed some yaml options to not conflict with archipelago defaults
  - in "starting_weapon_requirement", `random` was changed to `no_requirements` 
  - in "early_blacksmith", `random` was changed to `anywhere` 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2
v0.5.2.title: v0.5.2

v0.5.3.description:
# DarkSoulsII Archipelago - v0.5.3

## What's Changed
* Made Estus Flask Shard and Sublime Bone Dust Useful by @richarm4 in https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/pull/52
* Added proper logic for DLCs and renamed some of the locations
* Added the first item "bundle", that being the "Smelter Wedge x11"
* Fixed Memory of Jeigh location that wasn't labeled as NG+
* Changed it so now shops can't have progression or useful items
* Fixed problem where some items would retain the infusion/upgrade level of the default item for that location

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3
v0.5.3.title: v0.5.3

v0.5.4r2.description:
# DarkSoulsII Archipelago - v0.5.4

## What's Changed
* Added proper rules for locations that required killing Vendrick
* Proper rules are now set in place to have the 5 souls of a giant be in logic before Vendrick
* Added new "combat logic" option that dictates how many estus shards/bone dust is required between certain zones, with easy, medium, hard, and disabled options; only disabled will have Lost Bastille (and Sinners' Risein vanilla) be sphere 1 locations
* Item pool now is guaranteed to have 5 souls of a giant, 5 sublime bone dusts, and 12 estus flask shards, which are all Progression as consequences of combat logics
* Human Effigies are now considered Useful
* Fixed some locations after shrine of winter that were considered accessible before opening it
* Made the Undead Lockaway Key a logical requirement for Skeleton Lords
* Added missing rules for some of Vengarl's shop items

## New Contributors
* @Spectralpt made their first contribution in https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/pull/60

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.5.3...v0.5.4
v0.5.4r2.title: v0.5.4

v0.5.5.description:
## What's Changed
- Added proper rules for the fang key
- Added missing rule for requiring a statue be unpetrified to kill body of vengarl
- Fixed dark chasm of old connections
- Added extra requirements to salamander pit so it isn't required sphere 1
- Marked pursuer drop as missable since if you kill him before the fight he doesn't spawn
- Fixed two dlc locations that were in the wrong region
- Added aldia key to SOTFS item pool and added proper rules
- Marked the gulch wooden chest as missable since it can currently be broken
- Marked fang key and house key locations as missable since these currently wont send if you already have the original item
- Separated the Cathedral of Blue into it's own region and added proper rules
- Added missing location description and rules for a corpse in Doors of Pharros

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.5.4...v0.5.5
v0.5.5.title: v0.5.5
